subject: perfect time to surf santa crz

parts.part1: Waiting for the perfect wave? Missing out while you debate whether conditions are right? Santa Cruz has epic surf happening right now.
parts.part2: Don't let another perfect session slip away. Grab your board and get out there. Santa Cruz is calling – answer the wave.
parts.fullScript:
Waiting for the perfect wave? Missing out while you debate whether conditions are right? Santa Cruz has epic surf happening right now.

Don't let another perfect session slip away. Grab your board and get out there. Santa Cruz is calling – answer the wave.
